p: ( E)- Cinnamaldehyde, was the predominant compound in CC, SW and SG extracts prepared using steam distillation, Infusion and solvent extraction respectively ( Table 3). In pressured water extracts of SW and SG; Benzoic acid (1.6%, 15.49%), ( E)-Cinnamaldehyde (5.8%, 5.46%), Cinnamyl alcohol (32.44%, 40.08%), and 4-Allyl-2,6-dimethoxyphenol (10.2%, 12.71%) were the major compounds present ( Table 3).
